author: Special Correspondent
text:
The Employees Provident Fund Organisation’s Sub-Regional Office here will conduct the ‘Nidhi Aapke Nikat’ grievances redress programme at the Sub-Regional Office, Sree Jayalakshmi Plaza, Anna salai, Swarnapuri, in the city on January 11. C. Amudha, Regional PF Commissioner-II will preside over the meeting. The subscribers can meet the officials and air their grievances between 10.30 a.m. and 1 p.m.; employers between 3 and 4 p.m. and exempted establishments between 4 p.m. and 5 p.m.

The details of grievances should be sent to the Public Relations Officer on or before January 7. They may also send the grievances through e-mail atsro.salem@epfindia.gov.in.
title: PF grievances redress
